title: Freljord Taliyah Auto-Attack Visual Bug

embed.description: The higher the frames, the worse it gets.

body: I'm not sure if this is intended or not, but when you have low frames, the animation on Taliyah's Freljord skin looks kindof fine, but the higher your frames go (any higher than 20fps), the more slanted and out of place the autos look. I'm sure this isn't intended as its super weird looking, but i hope it can be looked into. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hello, hello! 

Thanks for the report! This certainly isn't intended; this isn't how this lady shipped. I plan on looking into this one today. :)
Hi, I realize this thread is 3 months old and that you mentioned lower that the issue would be resolved in 7.16, but it is currently 7.21 (date Nov. 4) and this is still happening.

Hi hi! 

This was fixed in 7.16, but resurfaced in this patch (7.21). It'll be good to go again in 7.22.
Yay, Freljord Taliyah's basic attack animation is so smooooooth. :)
Hey, bug still around, it's  very frustrating as the animation "flickers" or shift looks changing between a small snowball and a wack icicle makes it very unreliable to farm with. Hurry xD
It isn't so big as to hot fix it's gonna be out next patch
who are you and why are u commenting on this old comment
Don't be salty i just said it wasn't fix cause I play Taliyah alot and it's pretty annoying playing with this bug :/
How is it that this gets a same day report, when i posted about Desert Shurima Zilean's passive bug twice - months apart - and no one cares?
